## 📦 Installation

### Global Installation (Recommended)

```bash
# Install globally for CLI access
npm install -g {{PACKAGE_NAME}}

# Verify installation
{{CLI_COMMAND}} --version
```

### NPX Usage (No Installation Required)

```bash
# Use without installing
npx {{PACKAGE_NAME}} --help
npx {{PACKAGE_NAME}} {{COMMON_COMMAND}}
```

### Local Development

```bash
# Clone and install
git clone https://github.com/n-ae/confytome.git
cd confytome
npm install

# Use locally (workspace development)
node packages/{{PACKAGE_DIR}}/cli.js --help
```
